casebody.data:
IN RE: T.T.E. 238A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 18, 2018 Michelle F. Lynch, Attorney at Law, for T.T.E. Janelle E. Varley, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of December 2018 by Juvenile:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of December 2018."

Juvenile shall have up to and including the 28th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
